title: AST SpaceMobile surges on 2 major expansion sites
description: AST SpaceMobile delivered news Thursday that sent its stock climbing nearly 15%, proving that big bets on satellite manufacturing can capture Wall Street’s imagination. The space-based cellular connectivity company announced plans to establish two new product…
